subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Amar’e Stoudemire had 41 points against the Suns but drew closer to an automatic one-game suspension, and Danilo Gallinari looked strong in his first game back from a knee injury.
snippet: Amar’e Stoudemire had 41 points against the Suns but drew closer to an automatic one-game suspension, and Danilo Gallinari looked strong in his first game back from a knee injury.
